price: 14 qui voguait sous Nos Yeux, afin de récompenser celui qui avait été renié.
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
